results.definition: (music) rapid sliding up or down the musical scale
examples: the violinist was indulgent with his swoops and slides

results.definition: seize or catch with a swooping motion
move down on as if in an attack
examples: The raptor swooped down on its prey
The teacher swooped down upon the new students

results.definition: a swift descent through the air
move with a sweep, or in a swooping arc
